articles.title: A.2 Strain Found in Two Indian Monkeypox Cases; All You Need to Know About its Symptoms, Virulence & Differ - News18
articles.description: The current outbreak in Europe is being driven by the B.1 strain of Monkeypox virus
articles.content: An analysis of Indias first two monkeypox cases by an institute of the ICMR revealed that the duo who returned from the UAE were infected with the virus strain A.2, which is different from the one ca… [+1929 chars]

articles.title: UN chief demands international access to Ukraine nuclear plant after new attack - Reuters
articles.description: U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres called on Monday for international inspectors to be given access to the Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant after Ukraine and Russia traded accusations over the shelling of Europe's largest atomic plant at the weekend.
